Container.Name: Firefly-III-Toolbox
Container.Overview: Web automation suite for FireflyIII. Includes tools for duplicate detection, subscription analysis, AI-powered categorization, bank imports and transaction enrichment via Amazon/PayPal exports.

Config.Name: Firefly-III URL
Config.Description: The URL to your Firefly-III instance.

Config.Name: Firefly-III API Token
Config.Description: A personal access token to access Firefly-III. Visit https://docs.firefly-iii.org/how-to/firefly-iii/features/api/ to learn how to create an API token.

Config.Name: PORT
Config.Description: The host port on which you want to access the toolbox on.

Config.Name: Application URL
Config.Description: The URL this application will be accessed on, e.g. http://192.168.1.10:3000 or https://ff-toolbox.example.com

Config.Name: Additonal CORS Origins
Config.Description: Allows you to set additonal URLs to access the applications on, e.g. http://192.168.1.10:3000

Config.Name: Authentication Session Secret
Config.Description: Set this to a strong 32 character string. You can get one by running

Config.Name: Authentication Methods
Config.Description: Sets the enabled and used authentication methods. Available methods are:

Config.Name: Basic Authentication Username
Config.Description: Sets the username of the basic authentication.

Config.Name: Basic Authentication Password
Config.Description: Sets the password of the basic authentication.

Config.Name: OIDC Authentication Issuer URL
Config.Description: The URL to your auth provider for this application, e.g. https://auth.example.com/application/o/firefly-toolbox/

Config.Name: OIDC Authentication Client ID
Config.Description: The client id from your SSO provider for this application.

Config.Name: OIDC Authentication Client Secret
Config.Description: The client secret from the SSO Provider for this application.

Config.Name: Firefly-III OAuth Authentication Client ID
Config.Description: The client id from the created Firefly-III OAuth Client.

Config.Name: Firefly-III OAuth Authentication Client Secret
Config.Description: The client secret from the created Firefly-III OAuth Client.

Config.Name: AI Provider
Config.Description: Can be openai or ollama. You will have to configure those providers separately.

Config.Name: OpenAI API Key
Config.Description: The API Key to use for the OpenAI provider.

Config.Name: OpenAI API URL
Config.Description: The OpenAI API URL or another OpenAI compatible API URL.

Config.Name: OpenAI Model
Config.Description: The model to use with the OpenAI provider.

Config.Name: Ollama API URL
Config.Description: The URL of your ollama installation, e.g. http://192.168.1.10:11434

Config.Name: Ollama Model
Config.Description: The ollama model to use.

Config.Name: FinTS Product ID
Config.Description: A valid FinTS product id retrieved by registering at https://www.fints.org/de/hersteller/produktregistrierung

Config.Name: Default Language
Config.Description: This setting forces a language for all users. If left empty it will use the language detected by the browser with

Config.Name: Number Format Locale
Config.Description: For example en-US. Only set this if you encounter issues with amounts.

Config.Name: Number Format Decimal
Config.Description: Set this to the decimal character used by your language. Only set this if you encounter issues with amounts.

Config.Name: Log Level
Config.Description: The log level can be one of the following: debug, info, warn, error or silent.

Config.Name: Number Format Thousands
Config.Description: The thousands character used by your language. Only set this if you encounter issues with amounts.
